database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS CF sputum bacterial isolates
entry.description: This is LC-MS/MS data on bacterial isolates from various CF sputum samples. The bacteria are grown on either artificial sputum medium (ASM) or ISP2 medium. If ASM medium, it is named in the filename, if not it is ISP2.
